description:
G-code generator for 3D printers (Bambu, Prusa, Voron, VzBot, RatRig, Creality, etc.)


This is a hotfix for OrcaSlicer 2.1.0.
It fixes several bugs found in version 2.1.0, so updating is recommended.
It also includes some new profiles and translation updates.

What's Changed

  Bug fix
    - Fixed a regression bug where small area flow compensation was not working in v2.1.0 https://github.com/SoftFever in https://github.com/SoftFever/OrcaSlicer/pull/5844
    - Fixed a bug where slicing results were sometimes incorrect for multiple material models on Mac machines. by https://github.com/SoftFever in https://github.com/SoftFever/OrcaSlicer/pull/5856
    - Fixed a bug related to the mirror operation by https://github.com/Noisyfox in https://github.com/SoftFever/OrcaSlicer/pull/5827
    - Fixed a regression bug that caused failures when uploading large gcode files to PrusaLink-connected printers by https://github.com/Noisyfox in https://github.com/SoftFever/OrcaSlicer/pull/5843
  Printer profils
    - Fix Qidi profile bugs by https://github.com/HYzd766 in https://github.com/SoftFever/OrcaSlicer/pull/5801
    - Adding official profiles for Geeetech printers by https://github.com/whoseyoung in https://github.com/SoftFever/OrcaSlicer/pull/5790
    - Resolves https://github.com/SoftFever/OrcaSlicer/pull/5808: Fix missing K1C processes by https://github.com/BruffyT in https://github.com/SoftFever/OrcaSlicer/pull/5815
    - Add Flyingbear Ghost 6 profile by https://github.com/kybarg in https://github.com/SoftFever/OrcaSlicer/pull/5826
    - Update Ender-3 V3 printer profiles by https://github.com/kybarg in https://github.com/SoftFever/OrcaSlicer/pull/5771

  Translation updates
    - Translate and fix spanish by https://github.com/tadeu2 in https://github.com/SoftFever/OrcaSlicer/pull/5833
    - Update russian translations (2.1.0 Release) by https://github.com/AndylgTom in https://github.com/SoftFever/OrcaSlicer/pull/5800
    - Update Korean Translation (v2.1.0) by https://github.com/ElectricalBoy in https://github.com/SoftFever/OrcaSlicer/pull/5804
    - Update TURKISH translations by https://github.com/olcayoren in https://github.com/SoftFever/OrcaSlicer/pull/5831
    - Added new strings for French by https://github.com/bistory in https://github.com/SoftFever/OrcaSlicer/pull/5870
    - Typo fix by https://github.com/bistory in https://github.com/SoftFever/OrcaSlicer/pull/5871
